entry.title: Our journey from developers to real software engineers
entry.summary:
Description

Few years ago, we were a bunch of cowboys trying to create the fastest flight ticket search engine. We did a lot of mistakes... But we did it with passion. I will talk about how we knew how to avoid all the stupid issues, but why were we not able to do it at the same time.
